name: Krau, Prime Crime
description:
Krau is the 7th AntiMetro, Meta creature developed by Khuzzard of the future to decimate human civilization.

Krau is the king of alleys, puppeteer of the people's council, the one who controls every socio-economic activity.

He is Khuzzard's most elaborate plan, as he was groomed to climb political ladders as well as organized crime's bloody thrones.

He is the key to destroying humanity's trump card; unity and organizations.
